dialogue.text: Huh... where am I?
SURPRISE!!!
W-What do you mean “''surprise?''
Look around! I gathered up the whole\nUnofficial Boyfriend Fanpage community\nto this very spot!
While you were sleeping on that sidewalk, we all came together and formed a crowd!
Now EVERYBODY gets to meet you!
What? You…you surrounded me in FANGIRLS?
Exactly! Isn’t it awesome?
Awesome? One fangirl was PLENTY! I just wanted to go home, and now you have me SURROUNDED?
I fell asleep on COLD ASPHALT because YOU stopped me in my tracks!
I uh… I didn’t realize that you would feel this way...
Wait a minute... …WHAT DID YOU DO WITH\nGIRLFRIEND?
She uh…went crowd surfing...
CROWD SURFING? If that’s true, it\ncertainly wasn’t at her own will!
Girlfriend HATES people putting their hands all over her, except for MINE!
Listen, I don’t know what happened to her! She probably got lost in the crowd\nsomewhere, but couldn’t have gone far!
I thought I was doing something nice by\nletting you meet up with people who care about you!
Save the sob story for later, Lexi…... we can talk about this as soon as I get Girlfriend back.
But in the meantime, I’d say we’re about due for a song 3, wouldn’t you?
I only came prepared to sing 2...
Oh, don’t worry... …I’LL start this one.
